.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPager extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor
Public Class DataPager Inherits Control Implements IAttributeAccessor, ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor, INamingContainer
public ref class DataPager : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor
type DataPager = class inherit Control interface IAttributeAccessor interface INamingContainer interface ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor

summary.span: 提供實作 介面的資料繫結控制項分頁功能，例如 控制項。

span.span: Provides paging functionality for data-bound controls that implement the interface, such as the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [頁面巡覽區欄位Pager Fields](#pager_fields) - [頁面屬性Page Properties](#page_properties) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 頁面上的資料，並顯示實作的資料繫結控制項的導覽控制項，會使用類別介面。The class is used to page data and to display navigation controls for data-bound controls that implement the interface. (實作介面的控制項範例是控制項。)(An example of a control that implements the interface is the control.) 您可以建立關聯控制項與資料繫結控制項使用屬性。You can associate the control with the data-bound control by using the property. 或者，您可以在其中放置資料繫結控制項階層架構內的控制項。Alternatively, you can put the control inside the data-bound control hierarchy. 例如，在控制項，您可以放置內控制範本。For example, in the control, you can put the control inside the template. 您可以自訂每個資料頁會顯示藉由變更的項目數屬性。You can customize the number of items that are displayed for each page of data by changing the property. 您也可以變更伺服器送出頁面的方式，藉由設定屬性。You can also change the way a page is submitted to the server by setting the property. ## 頁面巡覽區欄位Pager Fields 為了讓控制項來顯示導覽控制項，您必須加入至控制項的頁面巡覽區欄位。In order for the control to display navigation controls, you must add pager fields to the control. 頁面巡覽區欄位是衍生自類別。The pager fields derive from the class. 下表列出您可以使用的頁面巡覽區欄位型別。The following table lists the pager field types that you can use. |頁面巡覽區欄位類型Pager field type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||可讓使用者瀏覽一個頁面中，一次，或是跳到第一個或最後一頁。Enables users to navigate through pages one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page.| ||可讓使用者選取 頁面的頁碼。Enables users to select a page by page number.| ||可讓您建立自訂分頁 UI。Enables you to create a custom paging UI.| 若要以宣告方式新增至頁面巡覽區欄位控制項，新增`Fields`項目控制項。To declaratively add pager fields to the control, add a `Fields` element to the control. 然後，您可以加入至頁面巡覽區欄位`Fields`項目。You can then add the pager fields to the `Fields` element. 頁面巡覽區欄位都會加入至集合中出現的順序`Fields`項目。The pager fields are added to the collection in the order that they appear in the `Fields` element. 集合可讓您以程式設計方式管理中的頁面巡覽區欄位控制項。The collection enables you to programmatically manage the pager fields in the control. ## 頁面屬性Page Properties 下表列出的唯讀屬性指定特性的資料頁的控制項。The following table lists read-only properties of the control that specify characteristics of the page of data. 這些屬性通常用於繫結中的運算式物件。These properties are usually used for binding expressions in the object. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||每個資料頁上顯示的最大資料錄筆數。The maximum number of records that are displayed for each page of data.| ||顯示在資料頁上第一筆資料錄的索引。The index of the first record that is displayed on a page of data.| ||基礎資料來源中可用的記錄總數。The total number of records that are available in the underlying data source.| ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 預設呈現的標記，此控制項的預設值可能不會符合協助工具標準，例如 Web 內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The default markup that is rendered default for this control might not comply with accessibility standards, such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需有關此控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ```                                                          ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將分頁功能，來新增控制項。The following example shows how to add paging functionality to a control. 此範例包含兩個控制項所使用的相同資料進行分頁控制項。This example contains two controls that are used to page through data of the same control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager/CS/DataPagerCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager/VB/DataPagerVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要動態方式加入控制項加入頁面中，建立新物件。To dynamically add a control to a page, create a new object. 設定其屬性，並再將它加入集合的容器控制項，例如控制項。Set its properties, and then add it to the collection of a container control, such as a control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用建構函式，以動態方式加入至網頁的控制項。The following example shows how to use the constructor to dynamically add a control to a page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法指定方法做為處理常式中所指定控制項的事件`container`。The method specifies the method as the handler for the event of the control specified in `container`. `container`參數必須包含資料繫結控制項，可實作介面，例如控制項。The `container` parameter must contain a data-bound control that implements the interface, such as a control. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充控制項。This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the control.

summary.span: 建立由 控制項的 屬性所包含的 物件。

span.span: Creates the objects that are contained by the property of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由屬性，經由方法來建立包含的物件屬性。The method is used by the property and by the method to create the objects that are contained by the property. 這個方法會呼叫方法用來在集合中建立使用者介面 (UI) 控制項，而每個欄位。This method calls the method to create the user interface (UI) controls for each field in the collection. 在中建立頁面巡覽區欄位控制項中頁面巡覽區欄位中出現的順序集合。The pager fields are created in the control in the order that the pager fields appear in the collection. 下表顯示的頁面巡覽區欄位的類別衍生自中，則可以建立類別，控制項。The following table shows the pager field classes that derive from the class and that can be created in the control. |頁面巡覽區欄位類型Pager field type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||可讓使用者瀏覽資料的一頁的頁面中，一次，或跳到第一個或最後一頁的資料。Enables users to navigate through pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data.| ||可讓使用者選取一頁的頁碼的資料。Enables users to select a page of data by page number.| ||可讓您建立自訂分頁 UI。Enables you to create a custom paging UI.|

summary.span: 將 控制項和其所有子控制項繫結至資料來源。

span.span: Binds the control and all its child controls to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個實作方法會覆寫基底類別實作。This implementation of the method overrides the base class implementation. 覆寫的方法會驗證它們繫結至資料來源之前，已建立所有子控制項。The overridden method verifies that all child controls have been created before binding them to a data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection Fields { get; }

member this.Fields : System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，這些物件表示 控制項中指定的頁面巡覽區欄位。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the pager fields that are specified in a control.

value.span: 集合物件，包含 控制項中指定的所有頁面巡覽區欄位。

span.span: A collection object that contains all the pager fields that are specified in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面巡覽區欄位會顯示在控制項中頁面巡覽區欄位中出現的順序集合。The pager fields are displayed in the control in the order that the pager fields appear in the collection. 下表顯示的頁面巡覽區欄位的類別衍生自類別，可用於集合。The following table shows the pager field classes that derive from the class and that can be used in the collection. |頁面巡覽區欄位類型Pager field type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||可讓使用者瀏覽資料的一頁的頁面中，一次，或跳到第一個或最後一頁的資料。Enables users to navigate through pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data.| ||可讓使用者選取一頁的頁碼的資料。Enables users to select a page of data by page number.| ||可讓您建立自訂分頁 UI。Enables you to create a custom paging UI.| 若要宣告方式指定的頁面巡覽區欄位控制項，將`Fields`內的項目控制項。To declaratively specify the pager fields for a control, put a `Fields` element inside the control. 然後，您可以列出您想要包含的開頭和結尾之間的頁面巡覽區欄位``標記。You can then list the pager fields you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 您可以程式設計方式加入至頁面巡覽區欄位集合。You can programmatically add pager fields to the collection. 不過，很容易就能列出的頁面巡覽區欄位以宣告方式在控制項。However, it is easier to list the pager fields declaratively in the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式新增至頁面巡覽區欄位的集合控制項。The following example shows how to declaratively add pager fields to the collection of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/CS/DataPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/VB/DataPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用屬性以動態方式加入物件到控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to dynamically add a object to a control. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分建構函式。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer FindPageableItemContainer ();

protected: virtual System::Web::UI::WebControls::IPageableItemContainer ^ FindPageableItemContainer();
abstract member FindPageableItemContainer : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer override this.FindPageableItemContainer : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer

summary.span: 擷取與 控制項關聯的資料繫結控制項。

span.span: Retrieves the data-bound control that is associated with the control.

returns.span: 與 控制項關聯的資料繫結控制項。

span.span: The data-bound control that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所擷取的資料繫結控制項參考資料來源物件包含的資料，控制頁面。The data-bound control retrieved by this method references a data source object that contains the data that the control pages. 針對控制項可以在頁面上的這項資料，資料繫結控制項必須實作介面。For the control to be able to page this data, the data-bound control must implement the interface. 方法會檢查是否屬性設定為資料繫結控制項的 ID。The method checks whether the property is set to the ID of a data-bound control. 如果未設定屬性，方法會在堆疊的命名容器，以尋找資料繫結控制項。If the property is not set, the method goes up the stack of naming containers to look for a data-bound control. 比方說，如果控制項是位於樣板控制項，屬性沒有設定。For example, if the control is inside the template of a control, the property does not have to be set. 這是因為方法可以自動尋找藉由檢查控制項樹狀結構的控制項。This is because the method can automatically find the control by examining the control tree.

exception.span: 在頁面上找不到實作 介面的控制項。

span.span: A control that implements the interface was not found on the page.
-or-

exception.span: 屬性 (Property) 指定的控制項沒有實作 介面。

span.span: The control specified by the property does not implement the interface.
-or-
The control does not have a naming container.

related.span: ListView Web 伺服器控制項

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

summary.span: 還原在上一個頁面要求時， 方法為 控制項儲存的檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: Restores view-state information for the control that was saved by the method during a previous page request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要是由[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

related.span: ListView Web 伺服器控制項

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當通知由這個方法時，Web 伺服器控制項必須執行才能建立並設定執行個體的任何初始化步驟。When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required in order to create and set up an instance. 在這個階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態有尚未填入。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has not yet been populated. 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，呼叫這個方法時，無論它是子網域或此控制項的父代。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 其他伺服器控制項不保證會建立且可供存取。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當您覆寫在衍生類別中，請確定您呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

related.span: ListView Web 伺服器控制項

protected public: override void OnLoad(EventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnLoad : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnLoad : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法告知伺服器控制項，它應該執行通用於每個頁面相關聯的 HTTP 要求的動作。The method notifies the server control that it should perform actions that are common to each HTTP request for the page that it is associated with. 在頁面生命週期中的這個階段，伺服器控制項階層架構中的會建立並初始化。At this stage in the page life cycle, server controls in the hierarchy are created and initialized. 還原檢視狀態，以及表單控制項反映從用戶端所張貼的值。View state is restored, and form controls reflect values that were posted from the client. 這項實作也會叫用方法來尋找容器控制項實作介面，而且它初始化頁面屬性。This implementation also invokes the method to find the container control that implements the interface, and it initializes the page properties. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

exception.span: 找不到實作 介面的容器控制項。

span.span: A container control that implements the interface was not found.

para.span: 當您覆寫在衍生類別中，請確定您呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發其基礎資料來源中的記錄總數可用時的事件。The control raises the event when the total number of records in its underlying data source is available. 方法是針對此事件處理常式，並負責更新與頁面相關的屬性，並重新建立頁面巡覽區欄位物件。The method is a handler for this event and is responsible for updating the page-related properties and recreating the pager field objects.

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的 ，這個控制項包含 控制項要進行分頁的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets the of the control that contains the data that will be paged by the control.

value.span: 控制項的 ，這個控制項包含 控制項要進行分頁的資料。

span.span: The of the control that contains the data that will be paged by the control.

value.span: 預設為空字串，表示未設定這個屬性 (Property)。

span.span: The default is an empty string, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要進行分頁包含資料之控制項控制項。Use the property to specify the of the control that contains the data that will be paged by the control. 指定的控制項必須實作介面，而且必須使用與相同的命名容器控制項。The specified control must implement the interface and must use the same naming container as the control. 您可以指定控制項的一個例子是控制項。An example of a control that you can specify is the control. 如果此屬性為空字串或`null`，則控制項可讓您檢查其容器控制項是否實作介面。If this property is an empty string or `null`, the control checks whether its container control implements the interface. 例如，在控制項中，屬性沒有 nelze nastavit，pokud 您放置內控制範本。For example, in the control, the property does not have to be set if you put the control inside the template. 這是因為控制項可以自動尋找藉由檢查控制項樹狀結構的控制項。This is because the control can automatically find the control by examining the control tree. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性以動態方式建立關聯控制項取代控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to dynamically associate a control with a control. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分建構函式。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor/CS/DataPagerCtorCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor/VB/DataPagerCtorVB.aspx#2)] 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式設定中的屬性頁面上的資料，以便控制控制項。The following example shows how to declaratively set the property in a control in order to page the data of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID/CS/DataPagerPagedControlIDCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID/VB/DataPagerPagedControlIDVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定每個資料頁上顯示的資料錄筆數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of records that are displayed for each page of data.

value.span: 每個資料頁上顯示的資料錄筆數。

span.span: The number of records that are displayed for each page of data.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定資料的頁面大小。Use the property to specify the size of a page of data. 如果您有多個控制項繫結至相同的頁面中控制項，請務必設定屬性的這些控制項，以相同的值。If you have multiple controls in a page that are bound to the same control, be sure to set the property of these controls to the same value. 如果控制項設定為使用不同的頁面大小、 上次要初始化的控制項會決定實際的頁面大小控制項。If the controls are set to use different page sizes, the last control to be initialized determines the actual page size of the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性中的控制項，以及如何以動態方式變更其值。The following example shows how to declaratively set the property in a control and how to dynamically change its value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize/CS/DataPagerPageSizeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize/VB/DataPagerPageSizeVB.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 屬性會設定為小於 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public string QueryStringField { get; set; }
.property instance string QueryStringField
Public Property QueryStringField As String
public: property System::String ^ QueryStringField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QueryStringField : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定查詢字串欄位的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the query string field.
The name of the query string field.

value.span: 預設值是空字串，表示 控制項會使用 HTTP POST 命令來巡覽頁面。

span.span: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the control will use a HTTP POST command to navigate through the pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定控制項會用來逐一導覽頁面的 HTTP GET 命令。Use the property to specify that the control uses an HTTP GET command to navigate through the pages. GET 要求中包含名稱/值組的查詢字串欄位會新增至頁面的 URL。In GET requests, a query string field that consists of a name/value pair is added to the URL of the page. 使用設定名稱屬性。The name is set by using the property. 值是相對應的頁面數目。The value is the corresponding page number. 如果為空字串或`null`，控制使用 HTTP POST 命令來逐一導覽頁面。If is an empty string or `null`, the control uses an HTTP POST command to navigate through the pages. 設定這個屬性是很有用，如果您想要有的資料由搜尋引擎編製索引的所有頁面。Setting this property is useful if you want to have all the pages of data indexed by a search engine. 這是因為控制項產生不同的 URL，針對每個資料頁。This occurs because the control produces a different URL for each page of data. 當您將設定屬性，可能會符合下列條件：When you set the property, the following conditions might apply: - 您有一個以上控制頁面和其參考相同的資料繫結控制項。You have more than one control in a page and they reference the same data-bound control. 在此情況下，請確定屬性的這些控制項設定為相同的值。In that case, make sure that the property of these controls is set to the same value. - 您有一個以上控制頁面和其參考不同的資料繫結控制項。You have more than one control in a page and they reference different data-bound controls. 在此情況下，請確定屬性的這些控制項設定為不同的值。In that case, make sure that the property of these controls is set to different values. 如果您將設定控制項相同的值，相關聯的資料繫結控制項將會進行分頁在此同時，因為它們會使用相同的查詢字串欄位。If you set the controls to the same value, the associated data-bound controls will be paginated at the same time, because they will use the same query-string field. 如果您未遵循先前的指導方針，可能會發生未預期的分頁行為。If you do not follow the previous guidelines, unexpected paging behavior can occur. 不過，控制項將會擲不回任何例外狀況。However, no exception will be thrown by the control. 如果屬性不是空字串或`null`，值屬性或物件會被忽略。If property is not an empty string or `null`, the value of the property of or objects is ignored. 在此情況下，這些物件會使用控制項來建立他們瀏覽按鈕。In that case, these objects use the control to create their navigation buttons. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性中的才能瀏覽頁面中，使用查詢字串的控制項。The following example shows how to declaratively set the property in a control in order to navigate through the pages by using a query string. 此範例包含兩個控制項，可顯示由單一的資料進行分頁控制項。This example contains two controls that are used to page through the data that is displayed by a single control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField/CS/DataPagerQueryStringFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField/VB/DataPagerQueryStringFieldVB.aspx#1)]

returns.span: 如果沒有與控制項相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放在伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically put in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 伺服器控制項生命週期的儲存狀態階段之後，這個屬性的值，然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 儲存檢視狀態時，這個字串物件傳送至瀏覽器會儲存在隱藏項目頁面中的變數。When view state is saved, this string object is sent to the browser as a variable that is stored in a hidden element in the page. 當您建立自訂伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改伺服器控制項的改善效率`ViewState`屬性。When you create custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying the server control's `ViewState` property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充控制項。This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the control.

related.span: ListView Web 伺服器控制項

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

param.name: databind
param.span: 在屬性設定後重新繫結控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to rebind the control after the properties are set; otherwise, .

summary.span: 在 控制項中設定頁面相關屬性。

span.span: Sets the page-related properties in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定新的值和屬性。The method sets new values for the and properties. 它也會叫用方法來更新相關聯的資料繫結控制項中與頁面相關的屬性。It also invokes the method to update the page-related properties in the associated data-bound control.

exception.span: 控制項沒有關聯的資料繫結控制項。

span.span: There is no data-bound control associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓設計工具重新設計階段建立控制項的子控制項的控制項。The method enables a designer for the control to re-create the control's child controls at design time. 介面方法會叫用方法，其中包含實際的實作，以及由控制項開發人員可以擴充它。The interface method invokes the method, which contains the actual implementation and which can be extended by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回 HTML 項目，以供方法來寫入的適當標記控制項。The property returns an HTML element that is used by the method to write the appropriate markup for the control. 此屬性會覆寫基底實作一定會傳回。This property overrides the base implementation to always return . > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充控制項。This property is primarily used by control developers to extend the control.

para.span: 您可以覆寫這個屬性，以指定哪一個用於衍生的控制項值。

span.span: You can override this property to specify which value to use for a derived control.

summary.span: 追蹤 控制項的檢視狀態變更，讓這些變更能夠儲存在控制項的 物件中。

span.span: Tracks view-state changes to the control so that they can be stored in the control's object.

summary.span: 您透過 屬性 (Property) 存取這個物件。

span.span: This object can be accessed through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結尾自動呼叫方法中的事件控制項的生命週期。The method is called automatically at the end of the event in the control's life cycle. 這個方法，系統會通知 ASP.NET 監視變更伺服器控制項檢視狀態。This method alerts ASP.NET to monitor changes to the server control's view state.
